welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kuningan, Indonesia! This charming city is known for its rich cultural heritage, beautiful landscapes, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Kuningan has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: Kedai Artha
restaurants.description: Kedai Artha is a café located in Kuningan.
restaurants.address: Jalan Dewi sartika no 30 (Perempatan Kabumen Sawah Waru), Kuningan, Jawa Barat 45511

restaurants.address: Jl. Veteran No. 157, Kuningan, Jawa Barat

restaurants.description: Kedai Salsa - Mang Petoy is a food truck located in Kuningan.
